entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard with a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead. (Excerpt: 'Harry raised a hand unconsciously to his forehead and rubbed the lightning-shaped mark.')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is concerned about Harry's safety. (Excerpt: 'He glanced up at Dumbledore and saw that he was wearing a satisfied expression.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who has returned to power. (Excerpt: 'I thought it would be burning all the time now Voldemort's getting so powerful again.')

relationships.description: Harry has been enjoying access to Voldemort's thoughts and feelings, but now Voldemort is employing Occlumency against him. (Excerpt: 'It appears that he is now employing Occlumency against you.')
